Description.enUS:
Advanced research facility. Contains upgrades for Science Vessels

Enables:
- Science Vessels at the Starport
Description.zhCN:
Advanced research facility. Contains upgrades for Science Vessels

Enables:
- Science Vessels at the Starport
Description.koKR:
Advanced research facility. Contains upgrades for Science Vessels

Enables:
- Science Vessels at the Starport

Tooltip.enUS: Transforms structure into a slow air unit for redeployment. May not produce units, research upgrades, or use abilities until it has landed.
Tooltip.ruRU: Перевести строение в режим воздушного перемещения для последующего размещения в другом месте. В этом режиме невозможно производить войска, проводить исследования, а также использовать специальные возможности.

Tooltip.enUS: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приостановить сооружение этого строения. Впоследствии его можно будет продолжить.

Tooltip.enUS: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.enUS: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.enUS: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить сооружение этого строения, уничтожив его и получив частичную компенсацию.

Tooltip.enUS: Selects the unit constructing this structure.
Tooltip.ruRU: Выбрать рабочего, который сооружает это строение.

Tooltip.enUS: Allows the Science Vessel to use the EMP Shockwave ability. EMP Shockwave fires an electromagnetic pulse that can damage enemy shields and reduce energy. Cloaked units hit by EMP are revealed for a short time.
Tooltip.zhCN: Allows the Science Vessel to use the EMP Shockwave ability. EMP Shockwave fires an electromagnetic pulse that can damage enemy shields and reduce energy. Cloaked units hit by EMP are revealed for a short time.
Tooltip.koKR: Allows the Science Vessel to use the EMP Shockwave ability. EMP Shockwave fires an electromagnetic pulse that can damage enemy shields and reduce energy. Cloaked units hit by EMP are revealed for a short time.

Tooltip.enUS: Allows the Science Vessel to use the Irradiate ability. Irradiates a single target, causing damage over time to the target and nearby units.
Tooltip.zhCN: Allows the Science Vessel to use the Irradiate ability. Irradiates a single target, causing damage over time to the target and nearby units.
Tooltip.koKR: Allows the Science Vessel to use the Irradiate ability. Irradiates a single target, causing damage over time to the target and nearby units.

Tooltip.enUS: Increases the Science Vessel's energy by and starting energy by .
Tooltip.zhCN: Increases the Science Vessel's energy by and starting energy by .
Tooltip.koKR: Increases the Science Vessel's energy by and starting energy by .

Tooltip.enUS: Allows production of Science Vessels at the Starport.
Tooltip.zhCN: Allows production of Science Vessels at the Starport.
Tooltip.koKR: Allows production of Science Vessels at the Starport.

Tooltip.enUS: Increases the Science Vessel's energy by and starting energy by .

Tooltip.enUS: Allows the Science Vessel to use the EMP Shockwave ability. EMP Shockwave fires an electromagnetic pulse that can damage enemy shields and reduce energy. Cloaked units hit by EMP are revealed for a short time.

Tooltip.enUS:
Advanced aircraft research facility. Contains upgrades for Battlecruisers. A Physics Lab can only be attached to a Science Facility.

Enables:
- Battlecruiser at the Starport
